name: SimulationX Project
summary: Learn about .ISX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The SimulationX project was introduced with the release of SimulationX 3.1. The project allows the saving and loading of models that can be encrypted with or without a password.

description: An ISX file is a project file used by SimulationX, an application used to simulate technical systems. The file is a compressed archive that contains CAD, recorded results, and animation data.
